title: About me
subtitle: I am a passionate and skilled DevOps and Cloud Engineer, as well as an MSSQL DBA, with a strong background in infrastructure provisioning, automation, and monitoring. I hold certifications from AWS as an AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate, and from Microsoft Azure as an Azure Certified Fundamentals and Azure Administrator.
details: I have experience working with tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, AWS DevOps, ArgoCD, Terraform, CloudFormation, and Ansible to streamline development processes and ensure efficient code deployment. I am proficient in managing and monitoring cloud infrastructure services on AWS and Azure, as well as maintaining high availability in Docker, ECS, and Kubernetes-based container clusters.

I have successfully implemented monitoring and logging tools like CloudWatch, Grafana, and Prometheus to ensure comprehensive visibility into system performance and have implemented GitOps for managing infrastructure as code. My expertise also includes integrating automated testing into the CI/CD pipeline and developing scripts to automate tasks, improving efficiency and reducing manual effort.

With a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology and a strong GPA, I am committed to continuous learning and professional growth. I am seeking opportunities to leverage my skills and contribute to the success of DevOps, SRE, and cloud engineering projects.
